price: نو كله يې چې له خپل فضل څخه څه وركړل، بخيلى يې غوره كړه او څنګ كوونكي بېرته وګرځېدل.
arabic: فَلَمَّآ ءَاتَىٰهُم مِّن فَضۡلِهِۦ بَخِلُواْ بِهِۦ وَتَوَلَّواْ وَّهُم مُّعۡرِضُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: falammā ātāhum min faḍlihi bakhilū bihi watawallaw wahum muʿ'riḍūna
